item.description:
Hi "Trailblazers" come join us for a "Murder Mystery Dinner Theater" at the "Governors Inn"

Ask for the "Trailblazers Table"

See you there!



Peter

Get your tickets early for the 16th annual Murder Mystery dinner at The Governor's Inn. "Mystery of the Murder on The Muppet Show"  will have a cast of 12 actors who sing and dance accompanied by live music, a big stage, various set locations during a raucous house tour, and a five-course dinner, this show is not only delicious and spectacular but chock full of scandal, intrigue, and laughs.

Seating is in group tables of ten.. The show begins with a grand musical number introducing all of your favorite Muppet show characters! Soon enough a murder takes place the audience then gets its turn at the fun, beginning with a rollicking house tour of the Inn -- five Muppet Show "scenes" with lots of food, drink, and audience participation, followed by more fun, music, and your chance to solve the mystery!

Your $59 ticket is non-refundable and not date exchangeable. The show goes on even in inclement weather, but if the Inn cancels due to severe weather, you'll have the option to re-schedule to another night or receive a refund less a $10 recovery charge.

Tickets includes the 5-course dinner, tax, and gratuity.
Order your tickets online by visiting the Governors Inn website at: www.governorsinn.com - for updates and more information including the menu.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

   


.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Murder Mystery Theate
